function upload()
	{
		if(!empty($_FILES["Filedata"])) 
		{
			$path = "Upload".DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR;
				
			move_uploaded_file($_FILES['Filedata']['tmp_name'], $path.$_FILES["Filedata"]["name"]);
		}
	}

?>
